name: phnvi

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cnv)
-| wcel(c0, ccphlo)
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cnv)
-| wcel(c0, ccphlo)
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

comment: Every complex inner product space is a normed complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
